Master of Deception.name: Master of Deception
descriptions: Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.
Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.  More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 1).
Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.  More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 2).
Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.  More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 3).
Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.  More effective than Master of Deception (Rank 4).

Opportunity.name: Opportunity
descriptions: Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, or Ambush abilities by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, or Ambush abilities by 8%.
Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, or Ambush abilities by 12%.
Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, or Ambush abilities by 16%.
Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, or Ambush abilities by 20%.

Sleight of Hand.name: Sleight of Hand
descriptions: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by 3% and reduces the energy cost of your Feint ability by 10.
Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by 6% and reduces the energy cost of your Feint ability by 20.

Elusiveness.name: Elusiveness
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by 60 sec. Also reduces the energy cost of Blind by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by 120 sec. Also reduces the energy cost of Blind by 20.
Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by 180 sec. Also reduces the energy cost of Blind by 30.

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
descriptions: Increases your speed while stealthed by 3% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 1 sec.
Increases your speed while stealthed by 6% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 2 sec.
Increases your speed while stealthed by 9% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 3 sec.
Increases your speed while stealthed by 12% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 4 sec.
Increases your speed while stealthed by 15% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 5 sec.

Initiative.name: Initiative
descriptions: Gives you a 33% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.
Gives you a 66% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.
Gives you a 100% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.

Ghostly Strike.name: Ghostly Strike
descriptions: The Rogue steps through the shadows, blinking 15 yds forward while striking all enemies in his path.

Stalker.name: Stalker
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by 15%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by 30%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by 45%.

Setup.name: Setup
descriptions: Gives you a 33% chance to add a combo point to your target after avoiding their attack or fully resisting one of their spells. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.
Gives you a 66% chance to add a combo point to your target after avoiding their attack or fully resisting one of their spells. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.
Gives you a 100% chance to add a combo point to your target after avoiding their attack or fully resisting one of their spells. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

Blackjack.name: Blackjack
descriptions: Reduces the energy cost of Sap by 20.
Reduces the energy cost of Sap by 40.
Reduces the energy cost of Sap by 60.

Serrated Blades.name: Serrated Blades
descriptions: Causes your attacks to ignore 0 of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by 10%.  The amount of Armor reduced increases with your level.
Causes your attacks to ignore 0 of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by 20%.  The amount of Armor reduced increases with your level.
Causes your attacks to ignore 0 of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by 30%.  The amount of Armor reduced increases with your level.

Heightened Senses.name: Heightened Senses
descriptions: Increases your Stealth detection, and reduces the chance you are struck by area of effect spells and abilities by 15%.
Increases your Stealth detection, and reduces the chance you are struck by area of effect spells and abilities by 30%.

Premeditation.name: Premeditation
descriptions: You automatically gain 1 combo point on your current target every 5 seconds.

Dirty Deeds.name: Dirty Deeds
descriptions: Reduces the Energy cost of your Cheap Shot and Garrote abilities by 15.
Reduces the Energy cost of your Cheap Shot and Garrote abilities by 30.

Hemorrhage.name: Hemorrhage
descriptions: An instant strike that damages the opponent and causes the target to hemorrhage, increasing all bleed damage dealt to the target by up to 10%.  Lasts 30 charges or 15 seconds.  Awards 1 combo point.

Deadliness.name: Deadliness
descriptions: Increases your Attack Power by 2%.
Increases your Attack Power by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power by 6%.
Increases your Attack Power by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power by 10%.

Shadow Warrior.name: Shadow Warrior
descriptions: Your Feint ability causes you to slip into the shadows for 5 seconds. This summons Shadow Warriors who deceive your target, allowing you to use Stealth abilities for the duration.
